sentences.en: A large multitude had assembled to hear him preach.
sentences.cn: 一大群人聚集起来听他布道.

sentences.en: A reverent hush descended on the multitude.
Addiction to drugs can bring a multitude of other problems.
sentences.cn: 毒瘾会带来许多其他问题。

sentences.en: Don't say you woke up late — say you were delayed. That covers a multitude of sins!
sentences.cn: 不要说你醒来晚了——说你因为什么事耽搁了.这是个冠冕堂皇的理由!

sentences.en: First one or two and then a multitude of cities.
sentences.cn: 刚开始一两个,接下去则有许许多多城市.

sentences.en: He has a multitude of friend.
I had never seen such a multitude of stars before.
sentences.cn: 我以前从未见过这么多的星星。

sentences.en: Political power has been placed in the hands of the multitude.
sentences.cn: 政治权力一直在民众手中.

sentences.en: The assembled multitude cheered and whistled as the political leaders arrived.
sentences.cn: 当政治领袖到达的时候，聚集的人群欢呼起来，并吹起了口哨。

sentences.en: The hideous truth was hidden from the multitude.
sentences.cn: 向大众隐瞒了骇人听闻的真相。

sentences.en: The transfer has been effected by a multitude of molecular collision.
sentences.cn: 这种转移是通过大量的分子碰撞而实现的.

sentences.en: There are a multitude of small quiet roads to cycle along.
sentences.cn: 有很多可以骑车的宁静小路。

sentences.en: There is [ are ] a multitude of reasons against it.
Thou mayest cover up thy secret from the prying multitude.
sentences.cn: 你可以对那些刨根问底的群众隐藏你的秘密.

sentences.en: You say that he owns a business, but " business " covers a multitude of sins.
sentences.cn: 你说他开了一家商行, 但 “ 商行 ” 两字下面藏有种种见不得人的东西.

words.tran_cn: 大批,大群,集合,成群结队

trans.tran_en: a very large number of people or things
